name: Super BomberHabbit
description:
Tension, strategy, action. Bomberhabbit is back more explosive than the original. Bigger, better, blah, blah, blah, they even put a story.
Cof, cof...
Two rabbits enter an abandoned manufacture of bombs to hide from a strong rain.
While exploring the place monsters attacked them, a bomb explode and one of the rabbits is taken.
Now, in search of saving his little brother, the oldest rabbit must cross the abandoned manufacture and face various enemies. original story ;)
Like the first one, Super BomberHabbit is a Bomberman fan game. With this project I try to reproduce some of the basic mechanics of the classic Hudson game in RPG Maker VX Ace.
Features:
-Average session: 25-35 min
-Stages: 12 stages
-Automatic save system.
-No need RTP.
Engine: Rpg Maker Vx Ace
Feel free to leave a comment below.
